about_the_game:
Skate Summit is a skate game with a nostalgic touch, reminiscent of more arcade-style and less realistic games. Immerse yourself in an adventure through Hawk City in this action platformer and defeat the evil RAD Inc., which is poisoning the city.

In this game you will take control of Rawson, a nonconformist teenager who wants to raise against the evil company who is ruining the city. You will have to join one of the city bands and convince them to join you in your fight against R.A.D inc in the Skate Summit competition. 

KEY FEATURES

Move around freely by foot or jump onto your skate and while jumping around and flipping your board. Complete challenges, fulfill deliveries and beat some corporate butt at the craziest skateboarding competition.

Perform amazing tricks and chain them with rails, pipes and some of the various amazing tricks you can perform on your board... or even without your feet on it!!!

Join one of the two bands that rule the city and earn their favour, complete tasks for them and talk to them while customizing your board and style... Show us who you are!!!

short_description: A platforming skate game with a nostalgic touch. A game packed with skate mechanics, without the overwhelming simulator commands, set in a cyberpunk world with retro vibes. Jump, grind, hit half-pipes, or go wild doing tricks!
